methods.name: getGuess
methods.description: return array of all guesses

methods.name: guessCount
methods.description: count of all guesses

methods.name: resetAnswer
methods.description: Reset user answers and shuffle the board again.

methods.name: isCorrect
methods.description: Return if the current answers are correct

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description:
Verify the answers of the user based on their saying
that they want to see how they did.

methods.name: _computeDisplayedAnswers
methods.description: Figure out the order of the answers which will be displayed

methods.name: playSound
methods.description: fire event about wanting to play a sound

methods.name: haxpreProcessNodeToContent
methods.description: HAX preprocess Node to Content hook

methods.name: haxpreProcessInsertContent
methods.description: HAX preprocess insert content hook

methods.name: renderInteraction
methods.description: our default implementation is a multiple-choice element

methods.name: inactiveCase
methods.description: the case for whether or not this is inactive based on user input

methods.name: renderDirections
methods.description: this manages the directions that are rendered and hard coded for the interaction

methods.name: renderLegend
methods.description: legend so user understands color relation to correctness

methods.name: renderFeedback
methods.description: this manages the output of the feedback area

methods.name: cleanAnswerData
methods.description: ensure data model of the answers is normalized

methods.name: answerPrototype
methods.description: things like order which is calculated

methods.name: processInput
methods.description: convert the input to data

methods.name: loadLightDomData
methods.description: this also makes it a lot more portable / readable and have better SEO (in theory)

methods.name: haxHooks
methods.description: Implements haxHooks to tie into life-cycle if hax exists.

methods.name: haxinlineContextMenu
methods.description: add buttons when it is in context
